lender.name: Jenny & Nathaniel
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Jenny is a music librarian and Nathaniel is a computer technician.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I believe in "paying it forward".
lender.occupational_info: I setup and maintain a Mobile TV trucks for the Sports & Entertainment Industry.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: its the right thing to do.

lender.name: Varakunan (Vara)
lender.loan_because: "You must be the change you wish to see in the world." - Mahatma Gandhi

lender.name: Marlene
lender.loan_because: I feel that we need to give back!!!
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a full time student and mom!!!

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: I know that microfinance works. I've seen the results in some of the less developed countries I've visited.
lender.occupational_info:
I spend two days a week teaching college geography - including development. I always use Kiva, All for Africa, and Heifer Project as examples of programs that work.
The rest of my work is related to animals - talking to them and helping them heal using Reiki, TTouch, and other complimentary therapies.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: "The difference between what we do and what we are capable of doing would suffice to solve the world's problems"...as a very wise man once said.

lender.name: art
lender.loan_because: we are all in this together!
lender.occupational_info: I create discussion groups regarding the topics of Character and Ethics.

lender.name: Daryn
lender.loan_because: It is nice to see someones dream's come true. Some people take money for granted, and for the people receiving this money, it means the world to them.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I can. I hope it helps another mother somewhere to be better able to take care of her children.
lender.occupational_info: My job as a mother needs no explanation. My other job: I help people with their feelings, help good parents be even better parents, and help kids grow up happy and healthy.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I think it's a great way to make a positive difference in the lives of many individuals and families around the world.
lender.occupational_info: My work is caring for children with a variety of diseases of the brain and nervous system. I like to be outdoors fishing, hunting, riding my bicycle. I also enjoy reading and learning about new things.

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: My late husband was an entrepreneur and successfully sustained our family of four. I honor his memory through this program.
lender.occupational_info: I provide administrative support to an attorney.

lender.name: zotter
lender.loan_because: I love entrepreneurship and i have the ability to help other.

lender.name: Ralaine
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I'm involved in helping children.

lender.name: David & Jen Bryant
lender.loan_because: I am a small business owner who would love to see other small businesses succeed across the world.

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Designing online training.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: I have been very lucky and I'm at a stage of my life where I want to contribute to opportunities for others.
lender.occupational_info: My job is stressful, but can have a lot of satisfaction.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I chose the group of Tanzanian woman with my children who are 9 & 11. We learned about the great things that Grameen bank & other microlenders have been doing and we wanted to get involved. The kids gave their own money.

lender.name: Alicia
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: ...hard working people deserve a helping hand.

lender.name: Ann & Her Girls
lender.loan_because: I'm trying to teach my girls about giving and its worldwide effect.
lender.occupational_info: I am blessed to be able to stay home and care for my children while my husband works.

lender.name: Albert van Egmond
lender.loan_because: I want to help people helping themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Managing a group of dedicated professionals who support the IT infrastructure of a teaching hospital in the Netherlands

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people to build good lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help people who are sick at home or in the hospital.

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: I want to help solve poverty world wide.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computer systems.

lender.name: Candy (Clara)
lender.loan_because: I have traveled over the world with my husband and we have seen some of the grandparents of these working people who need help. It's my pleasure to join people who feel the same way about make these peoples' jobs possible.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired now and a my husband and I have four grown sons and one grandson. He and I are both still interested in using some of our funds and time to help these striving people and their families.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: It's a way for me to help the world be a better place. I can help people who want to help themselves! If I can help make someone's life better it's an amazing accomplishment! (and it's a way for me to remember that I have much more that some people, and that I should think twice before wanting to buy something I don't really need).
lender.occupational_info: I'm a stay at home mom to a wonderful girl of 16 months.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I want everyone to have the same opportunity that I do.
lender.occupational_info: I make software for computers and internet websites.

lender.name: Paulo
lender.loan_because: Kiva gave me a great opportunity to do so.

lender.name: Samuel
lender.loan_because: There Is Enough
lender.occupational_info: X-Ray Technician

lender.name: Betty Anne and Ron
lender.loan_because: you just have to.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: My son gave me a Kiva membership as a holiday gift. I love the idea that people around the world can help one another so easily and so directly.

lender.name: Karen & Graeme
lender.loan_because: We live in the lucky country of Australia and have travelled the world and seen others in need of help - even $25 can make a difference !
lender.occupational_info: We both spent most of our employment working for a major airline and so we met people from many other countries and cultures.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of independence and being able to make a living from your work, ideas and talent.
lender.occupational_info: I am a book production assistant in Texas. I edit content and clean up the layout for Science books.

lender.name: Jenna and Todd
lender.loan_because: It's a small thing we are able to do to impact someone's life, in a positive way. It's something we can do to contribute to the 'Global Village'.

lender.name: Alejandro (elviejo)
lender.loan_because: Mexican government helped my family when I was a kid
lender.occupational_info: I make webpages.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: Helping people to help themselves is the only way out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I work with investors to help them maximize their investment returns.

lender.name: Michael Alexis
lender.loan_because: It's a practical way of supporting growth in developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: I study law.

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: Loaning is an easy way to give back to a world that I believe I get so much from.
lender.occupational_info: I fly around in a big airplane and serve Cokes to strangers.

lender.name: Kalani
lender.loan_because: I have lived in countries with people who struggle to take care of themselves and their families. I can see what amazing things people can do when they get a small help. I am glad to be a tiny part of that.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a rural town by the ocean taking care of people with immediate emergency medical needs. I am married with five children, now all grown.

lender.name: Steven
lender.occupational_info: I am a dishwasher at Applebee's

lender.name: Juan Jaramillo
lender.loan_because: I have been privileged to have people that could help me when I needed and now I can do the same but with people all over the world. I believe that small and personal efforts like the ones fomented by Kiva increase the economic well being of humanity and promote an international dialogue towards a better global village.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an international health logistics project by providing capacity building to developing nations in the area of forecasting and supply planning.

lender.name: Aimee Rae
lender.loan_because: Every contribution helps when starting or growing a business. I also feel this model is a much more positive contribution to the global community. The large banking institutions do not bring the people and the money together like this service does.
lender.occupational_info: I manage people and technology required to make web sites.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to support others who are building their families future.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure low income housing is decent and safe for habitation.

lender.name: Brett
lender.loan_because: i feel obligated to help those in need. I was blessed with many things that people around the world do not have.

lender.name: marilyn
lender.loan_because: I honor the life of Judge Solomon Casseb, Jr. in my first 3 loans to men of Lebanon. My 4th loan is to honor the loving spirit and nature of my beloved brother Michael in California.

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: People who work with integrity to make a better life for themselves end up creating a better world for all of us.
lender.occupational_info: Women's Health Care Provider

lender.name: Mathies
lender.occupation: Web + communication at KUNSTEN Modern Art Aalborg
lender.loan_because: I care, I can
lender.occupational_info: Making people work better with the web.

lender.name: $T3PH3N *864*
lender.loan_because: I loan because I am thankful to have everything that I need & to help people that don't.

lender.name: Alexandra
lender.occupation: Writer for a non-profit peace organization
lender.loan_because: Microfinance is highly effective in helping families to rise out of poverty. Women who borrow often are now able to get their children educated. In Bangladesh, the entire society is rising out of poverty, at least in part, due to the effectiveness of microfinance by the Grameen Bank. I want to be a part of changing the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer. I write advertising for a new company that my husband and I are creating. I also volunteer as a writer for an NGO in the U.S. that is helping people in the Israeli/Palestinian region to become more tolerant and to bring peace.

lender.name: Umair
lender.loan_because: I believe the people whom I loan the money, I see them on KIVA.org and I compare my life to them...such disparities urge me to help.

lender.name: Carter
lender.loan_because: It's great to help people!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student.

lender.name: Devin
lender.loan_because: Gratitude & stewardship for what I have been given.
lender.occupational_info: I build wind turbines to generate electricity from the wind.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: my children just gave me a wonderful Christmas present and I couldn't wait to share my blessings with others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a dental hygienist, teaching people how to stay healthy by taking care of their teeth.

lender.name: Elena
lender.loan_because: I believe people need tools, not handouts, to improve their lives and conserve their dignity.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Spanish to native speakers of Spanish at the middle school level. We focus on literacy, cultural awareness, the arts and creativity. I also teach English to a broad spectrum of people when outside of the USA.

lender.name: Christian and Gaviota
lender.loan_because: We want to help those in need.

lender.name: Janine
lender.loan_because: It is terrific how you can help a small business out there with just the click of a button.

lender.name: Tamara
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference!

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: There's plenty of money for everyone in this world if we're all willing to share

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I'm thankful for what I have, and I respect hard work and the ability to make things happen for oneself.
lender.occupational_info: My previous job was making sure computer programs work properly. Currently I'm a student learning how to communicate ideas with pictures.

lender.name: Ducklow Family
lender.occupational_info: We are a family

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: It is nice to see people taking initiative to create a sustainable source of income for themselves and others by providing goods and services
lender.occupational_info: I lead a business that mfg's products to help companies discover causes and treatments of disease

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: It's the least I can do!
lender.occupational_info: I coordinate the closings for homes sold by banks after forelcosure.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I have such a good life that I would like to see others live better.
lender.occupational_info: I recently retired from teaching elementary school. I now volunteer in five classrooms helping children to learn.

lender.name: Takahisa
lender.loan_because: I would be feeling happier if someone in the world could achieve better life using this money and he or she could also feel happier.

lender.name: Jeff Weyers
lender.loan_because: Positive change will only come from positive actions.

lender.name: Amy Chau
lender.loan_because: I feel fortunate and want to share with others.

lender.name: Marty
lender.loan_because: my money helps more people by loaning rather than just giving.
lender.occupational_info: Retirement means a shortage of time to do all that you want to do!

lender.name: The Campbell Family
lender.loan_because: I want to help others better their situation and I want to show my children the importance of touching other peoples lives in a positive way for the greater good.

lender.name: Doran Family
lender.loan_because: I can. It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 12 and 13 year olds in California about the world.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: Kiva.org helps make it possible for one person to make a difference in the world...

lender.name: Marian
lender.loan_because: its nice to help others
lender.occupational_info: watch children

lender.name: Joe S. Brooklyn
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to make Kiva loans due to the generosity of others when I needed a jump start myself.
lender.occupational_info:
Inspired by Blake Mycoskie of Toms Shoes, my brother and I started a wholesale and eCommerce Reading Glasses Company called MoralEyes. For every pair purchased we donate a pair to someone in need through a partnership with Non-Profit, New Eyes for the Needy based in Short Hills, NJ. We have donated 1200 glasses to them already and are planning to donate another 2400 reading glasses this Wednesday 4/27/2011.
The glasses are available for retail purchase on MoralEyes.Com or Amazon.Com and Community Bookstore in Park Slope and will soon be available nationwide. We are still looking for independent sales reps in most territories.
Wholesale & Retail Fashionable Reading Glasses and Sun-readers are only our first pursuit in developing partnerships between products and charities.
Joe Sacks,
CEO JZSacks, Inc. DBA MoralEyes

lender.name: Skyler
lender.loan_because: I care. I spent quite a bit of time in these countries in my youth. I am so grateful for the warmth, generosity, and wisdom of many local people I encountered in my travels. Thank-you. Now it is my time to give.
lender.occupational_info: Several years ago I started a small accommodation business which was inspired by my travel experiences. I have now expanded to include real estate sales. Becoming a self-employed business person is the best thing that ever happened to me in terms of both personal growth and economic independence. That is why I want to support other women entrepreneurs...I know how a little help can make a world of difference.

lender.name: Brian (Dad) & Anna
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am an arborist. I manage trees and people who manage trees. Trees are very important to the whole world.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I love this website! Isn't it amazing what can happen when resources are pooled.

lender.name: Faye
lender.loan_because: In some small financial way I can help make a tremendous difference in the success of someone's business.
lender.occupational_info: I have a small greenhouse business, I enjoy working with flowers.

lender.name: Charity
lender.loan_because: I believe in microenterprise and want to contribute to the improvement of our shared world.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find the health insurance they need because it is not a right in my country as it is in others.

lender.name: Mike & Erin
lender.loan_because: It's better than wasting it on a big dumb gas hog SUV? We're balancing our Karma accounts? It feels good & right to help others. "All the Freaky People make the Beauty of the World!"
lender.occupational_info: Mike- As a "burner," a participant in Burning Man, it is only right to spread kindness and love thru support, both spiritually and with our wallets. Burners for Kiva!

lender.name: Sally
lender.loan_because: I have had many opportunities in my life and I want to pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find homes.

lender.name: Chrissy G
lender.loan_because: As a small business owner, I love helping other small business people succeed!
lender.occupational_info: I design and publish hand knitting patterns and wholesale them to local yarn shops and small internet stores. I also design for knitting books and magazines.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I love helping others..."Be the change you want to see in the world," Ghandi
lender.occupational_info: I arrange flowers for people to purchase for weddings, funerals, and for special occasions

lender.name: Graeme & Laura
lender.loan_because: Because everyone deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info: Graeme writes articles for newspapers and magazines about science. Laura studies history at the University of Waterloo.

lender.name: Gina Ltourneau
lender.loan_because: I am thankful for what I have, and my small gesture can make a real difference.
lender.occupational_info: Translating from English to French. Writing in both languages.

lender.name: Johanna
lender.loan_because: I want to help others succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I research the impact of marketing on childhood obesity in the U.S.

lender.name: Megan and Chris
lender.loan_because: We can.
lender.occupational_info: Dancing, music loving doctor marrying musical, flimmaking poet cowboy.

lender.name: Royelen Lee
lender.loan_because: it's a great gift
lender.occupational_info: We protect your right to clean, safe, affordable food and water.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: ...to honor the opportunity of life.

lender.name: Trent
lender.loan_because: I'm a chill guy
lender.occupational_info: About me? Well I just turned 18, and i decided why not do something productive.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It feels good to give people a chance
lender.occupational_info: I have my own business making and selling Organic and Natural Chicken, Turkey, Beef and Pork.

lender.name: Fi D
lender.loan_because: I don't think we can afford not to help each other out
lender.occupational_info: Animator, film-maker, Visual artist, photographer, graphic and website designer

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I want more people around the world to improve their lives and the lives of the people in their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I invest my time and my money to help entrepreneurs build successful companies.

lender.name: Lulu & Tori
lender.occupation: Grandaughter & Personal Chef on private jet.
lender.loan_because: Jesus has blessed us so we can be a blessing to others.

lender.name: Maja
lender.loan_because: I care about all earthlings and at this time I can help out.
lender.occupational_info: people oriented, environmental, professional, political

lender.name: saxon
lender.loan_because: I loan beacause i want to see what happens whaen I pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: The way i would describe being a student is, at times can be very fun, but sometimes can be boring and hard.

lender.name: Yellowstone Avenue
lender.loan_because: People need help and if the many leaders of the world won't do anything about it, it might as well be us.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because:
It's so easy to forget the rest of the world doesn't live like we do, that opportunity isn't as readily accessible, and how lucky we really are to lead the lives we do.
I've had so much help and encouragement and feel this is one of the better ways to pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I write software and build websites for a living, I work from home and although live with technology all around me, I'm always actively looking for ways to reduce my carbon footprint.

lender.name: babs
lender.loan_because: This is a small way for me to help others achieve their dreams.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: it works

lender.name: Boris
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to improve their lives.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: This is probably the best way to help people improve their lives. I have enough, and would like to share.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to become a teacher.

lender.name: Ville
lender.loan_because: I consider myself fortunate and want to share with my neighbors to help make the world a better place for all of us and the future generations. Kiva is really world-changing, a big thank you to everyone involved! By the way, "kiva" means "nice" in Finnish :-)
lender.occupational_info: I write computer programs to help scientists understand biology and develop new drugs against disease. I also study medicine.

lender.name: georges
lender.loan_because: i want to grow my business
lender.occupational_info: import and export of clothing and more things

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with more opportunities in this world than I deserve. God has called me to be His instrument in giving others opportunities to support themselves and their families.

lender.name: Vanessa & Alex
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference

lender.name: Julianne
lender.loan_because: in the past people have helped me, and I am proud to help women achieve their goals

lender.name: Becky
lender.loan_because: I want to teach my kids about making a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work closely with senior executives at a large US technology company to create a compelling story for our business.

lender.name: thom & heidi
lender.loan_because:
God is good!
people lending to people is much better than institutions lending to people.
lender.occupational_info:
heidi is a nurse who delivers babies.
thom buys small homes and rents them.

lender.name: Romin
lender.loan_because: Financing entrepreneurs is my passion and Kiva allows to me to loan to people that I would otherwise not be able to reach.
lender.occupational_info: I invest in small companies and provide advice to their entrepreneurs

lender.name: Kieran
lender.loan_because:
Western white male guilt compells me to purchase a bit of feel good now and then.
Plus, I like the idea of supporting initiatives that have actually come from the person/community seeking assistance.
lender.occupational_info: Stack shelves at a supermarket, study at a university, advocate anarchist communism everywhere.

lender.name: Rabson
lender.loan_because: I would like to start up a resource centre were i can assist other youths to be able to start ther oun initiatives and get to sustain themselves unlike getting involved in drugs, crime and violence
lender.occupational_info: i am running a no-profit were i educate youth on taking a pro active role in the prevention of crime,drug abuse and violence

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I'm an entrepreneur, and it truely gives my life meaning, I want to share that joy with anyone that has the desire.
lender.occupational_info: Creating a Win - Win for everyone.

lender.name: miijii
lender.loan_because: I can and I should.
lender.occupational_info: I am a civilian clerk for the military.

lender.name: Mary Schumacher
lender.occupation: Small business owner - aftermarket car parts
lender.loan_because: I want to see others succeed. As a small business owner myself, I know that small loans at the right time can be the hardest to get but the most important to the future success of a small business.
lender.occupational_info: I do marketing for our small family business -- we manufacturer and market replacement and performance auto parts for older, classic vehicles.

lender.name: Tim and Jenn
lender.loan_because: we believe that individuals can make a difference.

lender.name: michele
lender.loan_because: a wonderful man called William gave this credit to me as gift and I would like to make a loan to one or two businesses in order to assist someone realise their dream
lender.occupational_info: i am a pro-active counsllor...this is helping people deal with their problem at hand, specialising in grief and loss of all kinds

lender.name: Shawn
lender.loan_because: Small actions can have great effect.

lender.name: Francesco
lender.loan_because:
"If you lend money to any of my people who are in need, do not charge interest as a money lender would."
Exodus 22,25

lender.name: Raina
lender.loan_because: I want to help others in need.
lender.occupational_info: Handmade artisan jewelry in gold and silver with precious and semi precious gem stones.

lender.name: Ron & Wietske
lender.loan_because: we believe this is a new and proper way to contribute to the economic growth of developing countries.

lender.name: John and Susan
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a great way to make dreams materialize for working people around the world. Sharing with them is a thrill!

lender.name: Vickie
lender.loan_because: I wish to share the good fortune that I have with others.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: it's a very direct and most of all sustainable way to support someone in need
lender.occupational_info: The most exciting job I can imagine right now - every day new, challenging and rewarding

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: others have given so much to me.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: i feel blessed having the resources that i do and am obligated to pass that blessing on to others in my own small way.
lender.occupational_info: I try to help children understand what their world view is and why they think that way about the world

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I like this concept of loaning funds to individuals who are looking to better themselves and the lives of their families.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: it is a fantastic way to help people help themselves....
lender.occupational_info: I work in real estate, selling property to English prople relocating to Spain.

lender.name: Tiago
lender.loan_because: We all can change the world...
lender.occupational_info: I develop software for the company Zetes.

lender.name: Kristin & Roger
lender.loan_because: We believe that people deserve help when they are being creative and supporting themselves and their loved ones.
lender.occupational_info: We install, troubleshoot, and repair navigation and communication systems on yachts and other vessels.

lender.name: Sari & Zoran
lender.loan_because: I know that we can make a difference.

lender.name: trapinhos
lender.loan_because: to receive is good and to give is even more great!

lender.name: Lissa
lender.loan_because: Most Americans have so much - just want to spread it around
lender.occupational_info: I work with teenagers at a public high school; help them decide on what they want to do in the future, help them solve problems in their lives, encourage them to work hard in school.

lender.name: Marnie
lender.loan_because: I love how this works.
lender.occupational_info: I design art that goes on dinner plates, napkins, plastic plates.

lender.name: Karen
lender.occupational_info: We build energy efficient, affordable housing.

lender.name: john
lender.loan_because: It feels good to know you're helping people out.
lender.occupational_info: I convince people to buy my product because it will make their lives better.

lender.name: Chris & Cheryl Cane
lender.loan_because: It just makes sense!
lender.occupational_info: Cheryl and I started our internet business in 1998. We are also entrepreneurs who now have an established home business. To some extent, we know what these folks are going through and wish them well.

lender.name: jacque
lender.loan_because: It brings me joy!

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of underprivileged people (especially women) to make a better life for themselves
lender.occupational_info: I help people make good choices about their money in order to realize their dreams

lender.name: Kristina
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed with a successful business myself, and why not give these amazing women a chance as well...I believe we all can do unbelievable things in life if just given the opportunity.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: my family is lucky to have enough.
lender.occupational_info: I work with girls and women to help them heal emotionally from problems in their past. I also write about issues that affect women and girls lives in Canada.

lender.name: Rose Family
lender.occupational_info: Denzil delivers papers, Nathaniel is an actor, Leslie is a teacher and Jonathan is a professor.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Leeland
lender.loan_because: I like to share what I have.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: The impact that such a small amount of money can make on the lives of those who receive the loans is enormous. Being able to see the faces and surroundings of the people the loans are made to personalizes the whole transaction and gives me a greater sense of gratitude for all that I have been blessed with.
lender.occupational_info: I appraise antiques and fine art.

lender.name: Maria Jos
lender.loan_because: I beleive it's possible to change the world doing simple things

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: Be a lamp, or a lifeboat, or a ladder. Help someone's soul heal. Walk out of your house like a shepherd. -Jalaluddin Rumi, poet and mystic (1207-1273)

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I appreciate anyone working hard who could utilize resources to work smarter and harder. It is good for the soul to be productive.

lender.name: John and Sue
lender.loan_because: I like to do what I can to create opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I help injured workers get the medical care and job placement assistance they need to get back to work quickly and safely.
